metadata.title: CVE-2017-0691 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Android media framework. Product:Android. Versions: 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36724453.

criterions.comment: digikam: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
digikam: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
